item.description:
Dogs of all shapes and sizes run off leash and swim. 'In tact' male dogs should be under the control of their owners and not badger other dogs continuously please.
NOTE ON A GOOD BOOK:
The Story of Edgar Sawtelle by David Wroblewski
This is the story of 2 generations of a family who breed dogs on a farm. You'll laugh, you'll cry, you'll learn about dogs!

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Furry Friends Frolic! A leisurely 1-1.5 hour walk at Burrage Pond.
